source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
	Distinct
	TABLE_NAME
from 
INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
where TABLE_NAME = 'Sales hierarchy'

Select
[Territory Code],
[Area Code],
[Branch Code],
[Zone Code],
[National Code],
[National Name],
[Region Code],
[Region Name],
[Regional Sales Head Name],
[Branch Name],
[Branch Sales Head Name],
[Zone Name],
[Sales Manager Name],
[Area Name],
[Area Sales Manager Name],
[Territory Name],
[Sales Executive Name],
[Division Name],
[SE Code],
[Channel],
[Business Unit],
'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales hierarchy]
UNION ALL
Select
[Territory Code],
[Area Code],
[Branch Code],
[Zone Code],
[National Code],
[National Name],
[Region Code],
[Region Name],
[Regional Sales Head Name],
[Branch Name],
[Branch Sales Head Name],
[Zone Name],
[Sales Manager Name],

[Area Sales Manager Name],
